thread.title: Police searching for missing wallaby in Langley
thread.title_full: Police searching for missing wallaby in Langley

author: Jill Slattery
title: Police searching for missing wallaby in Langley
text:
February 16, 2017 9:27 pm Updated: February 16, 2017 9:28 pm Police searching for missing wallaby in Langley By Jill Slattery Online Producer Global News 
A wallaby Glen Fergus / Wikipedia What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' editorial staff without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... X What is this? 
Sponsored content is written by Global News' without any editorial influence by the sponsor. If you'd like to learn more... - Listen 
A wallaby – a smaller version of a kangaroo – is on the loose in Langley. 
RCMP have asked residents to be on the lookout for the exotic macropod after it escaped its enclosure inside a home. 
There’s already been a couple of sightings of the wallaby around the 22200-block of 56th Ave just south of the Willoughby area. © 2017 Global News, a division of Corus Entertainment Inc.
